key.name: whitebalance-enabled
key.description: If true, the applet is active and controls white balance. If false, it does nothing.

key.name: whitebalance-auto
key.description: If true, the webcam will use automatic white balance. If false, manual temperature will be set.

key.name: whitebalance-temperature
key.description: Manual white balance temperature, in Kelvin.

key.name: whitebalance-relative
key.description: Offset in Kelvin applied to the current temperature if auto mode is enabled.
